fields_of_interest: Budget, Consumers, Education and training, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health

Training & research networks, incl. ERN EuroBloodNet, IMI project HARMONY, Innovative Training Network PROFILE (Marie Curie)

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:

relevant_communication: Responding to consultations; attendance and speaking at meetings that include policy makers and politicians; issuing positions in Brussels media outlets; membership and participation in alliances and expert groups.
goals__remit: The European Hematology Association (EHA) promotes excellence in patient care, research and education in hematology.
